评论概述: Longer version that adds less bulk to waist
评论详情: This looks great from the front view, but I was sucking in for dear life as I was really looking for something that was long enough to cover/support my baby pouch, and this did not do that…just too short. It also added bulk if you looked at me from the side because of how the Velcro thickness was.  Great concept and maybe great For shorter torsos Or puffy dresses that aren’t formfitting, but still, I wouldn’t like the bulk it added to the thickness of my waist.  Hope this helps!

At a price that's better than the stores and for the exact same item, it's really cute and perfect for a lot of different outfits. I've had it for maybe a year or two now and it's still holding up.
